templateDsTableSql:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS bi_dw.dw_login_log_all_store (
								    `statis_date` int(9) NOT NULL,
									`user_id` bigint(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '用户ID',
								    `new_user` tinyint(4) NOT NULL COMMENT '0-新用户 1-老用户',
								    `sex_id` int(1) DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '1-男 2-女',
								    `age` int(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '年龄',
								    `industry_id` int(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '行业',
								    `network_id` int(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'network 网络类型维表dim_network字典匹配自增获取',
								    `channel` int(4) DEFAULT '1000' COMMENT '坐标渠道（1000-官方）',
								    `app_plat_id` int(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'app_device_type  平台应用类型维表dim_app_plat字典匹配自增获取',
								    `app_id` int(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'app_id',
								    `app_version_id` int(10) DEFAULT '2' COMMENT 'app_version 平台应用 版本维表conf_app_version字典匹配自增获取',
								    `os_id` int(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'os_name 操作系统维表dim_os字典匹配自增获取',
								    `os_version_id` int(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'os_version 操作系统版本维表dim_os_version字典匹配自增获取',
								    `manufacturer_id` int(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'device_vendor 设备生产厂家维表dim_manufacturer字典匹配自增获取',
								    `manufacturer_model_id` int(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'device_model 设备型号维表dim_manufacturer_model字典匹配自增获取',
								    `isp_id` int(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'oper_ip IP地址庫 固网运营商字典维表dim_isp字典匹配自增获取',
								    `country_id` int(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'oper_ip IP地址庫 国家字典表维表dim_country字典匹配自增获取',
								    `region_id` int(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'oper_ip IP地址庫 省/地区维表dim_region字典匹配自增获取',
								    `city_id` int(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'oper_ip IP地址庫 地市维表dim_city字典匹配自增获取',
								    `year` int(9) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1900' COMMENT '年',
								    `month` int(9) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '月',
								    `day` int(9) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '日',
								    `hour` int(9) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '小时',
									`visit_count` bigint(20) NOT NULL  COMMENT '访问次数',
									INDEX `idx_dw_interact_trace_date` (`year`, `month`, `day`),
									INDEX `idx_dw_interact_trace_range` (`statis_date`)
								) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
insertDsSelectSql:
INSERT INTO bi_dw.dw_login_log_all_store (
	                                `statis_date`,
									`user_id`,
								    `new_user`,
								    `sex_id`,
								    `age`,
								    `industry_id`,
								    `network_id`,
								    `channel`,
								    `app_plat_id`,
								    `app_id`,
								    `app_version_id`,
								    `os_id`,
								    `os_version_id`,
								    `manufacturer_id`,
								    `manufacturer_model_id`,
								    `isp_id`,
								    `country_id`,
								    `region_id`,
								    `city_id`,
								    `year`,
								    `month`,
								    `day`,
								    `hour`,
									`visit_count`
								) SELECT
								    `store_id` as statis_date,
									`user_id`,
								    `new_user`,
								    `sex_id`,
								    `age`,
								    `industry_id`,
								    `network_id`,
								    `channel`,
								    `app_plat_id`,
								    `app_id`,
								    `app_version_id`,
								    `os_id`,
								    `os_version_id`,
								    `manufacturer_id`,
								    `manufacturer_model_id`,
								    `isp_id`,
								    `country_id`,
								    `region_id`,
								    `city_id`,
								    `year`,
								    `month`,
								    `day`,
								    `hour`,
									count(1) as visit_count
								FROM
									bi_dwd.dwd_login_log_dm_yyyymm
								WHERE
									1 = 1
								AND `store_id` = ${store_id}
								group by `user_id`,
									`new_user`,
								    `sex_id`,
								    `age`,
								    `industry_id`,
								    `network_id`,
								    `channel`,
								    `app_plat_id`,
								    `app_id`,
								    `app_version_id`,
								    `os_id`,
								    `os_version_id`,
								    `manufacturer_id`,
								    `manufacturer_model_id`,
								    `isp_id`,
								    `country_id`,
								    `region_id`,
								    `city_id`,
								    `year`,
								    `month`,
								    `day`,
								    `hour`,
									`store_id`
delete_yes_date: delete from bi_dw.dw_login_log_all_store where 1=1 AND statis_date = ${statisDate}
delete_date: delete from bi_dw.dw_login_log_all_store where 1=1 AND statis_date < ${statisDate}
